Profile_Screen.title: Complete your profile
Profile_Screen.hint: Please enter your profile. Don't worry, only you can see your personal data. No one else will be able to see it. Or you can skip it for now.

Please wait...
Saving User Data Information.

Login_screen.msg: Please enter your email & password to log in.
Login_screen.hint_suc_msg:
Please wait...
You will be directed to the homepage.

Writing.hint1: Generate well-written articles on any topic you want.
Writing.hint2: Extract key points from long texts.

Creative.hint1: Generate stories from any given topic.

Business.hint1: Generate templates for emails, letters, etc.

Social Media.serchtitle1: Write an posts on LinkedIn about
Social Media.hint2: Write captions that attract audience on Instagram.

Developer.hint1: Write app & websites in any programming language.

Personal.hint1: Create sincere birthday wishes for loved ones.
Personal.hint2: Make an apology for the mistakes that have been made.

Others.hint1: Create conversation templates for two or more people.
Others.hint2: Write funny jokes to tell your friends and make them laugh.

privacysc.txt0: At Qubiko AI, we respect and protect the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect your information.
privacysc.txt1:
When you use our app, we may collect the following types of personal information:
Device Information: We may collect information about the type of device you use, its operating system, and other technical details to help us improve our app.
Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use our app, such as which features you use and how often you use them.
Personal Information: We may collect personal information, such as your name, email address, or phone number, if you choose to provide it to us.
privacysc.txt2:
We use your information for the following purposes:
To provide and improve our app: We use your information to provide and improve our app, including to personalize your experience and to analyze how our app is used.
To communicate with you: We may use your information to communicate with you about our app, including to provide you with updates and news about our app.
To protect our rights and the rights of others: We may use your information to protect our rights and the rights of others, such as to investigate and prevent fraud or other illegal activity.
